agents.name: Ideator
agents.role: Brainstorms initial concepts, plots, characters, and outlines

agents.name: Drafter
agents.role: Creates the first full draft based on the outline

agents.name: Reviser
agents.role: Edits and improves the draft for clarity, flow, and style

response_data.description: A backend server that orchestrates specialized AI agents for collaborative creative writing tasks

protocols./api/protocols: List all available protocols and their status
protocols./api/protocols/<protocol_id>: Get detailed information about a specific protocol
protocols./api/protocols/test: Test protocol processing on sample text

styles./api/styles/<style_name>: Get details about a specific style
styles./api/styles/category/<category>: Get styles in a specific category
styles./api/styles/recommend: Get style recommendations based on description

writing./api/job_result/<job_id>: Get final result of a completed job
writing./api/job_status/<job_id>: Get status of a specific job
writing./api/jobs: Get all jobs in the system
writing./api/start_writing: Start a new creative writing job (supports topic or outline input, style parameter, and protocol configurations)

features.multi_agent_workflow: Specialized agents adapt to different writing styles
features.outline_workflow: Support for both topic-based and outline-based workflows (skip Ideator when outline provided)
features.pocp_compat_protocol: Punctuation control protocol with configurable rules (disable, substitute, limit)
features.protocol_presets: Pre-configured protocol settings (no em dashes, formal writing, minimal punctuation)
features.protocol_system: Standardized text processing protocols for guaranteed output control
features.protocol_validation: Configuration validation and testing before applying to writing jobs
features.real_time_tracking: Monitor progress through each stage of the writing process
features.style_categories: Organized by content type (Creative Fiction, Analytical Writing, Technical Writing, etc.)
features.style_recommendation: AI-powered style recommendations based on content description
features.writing_styles: Support for 7+ writing styles (creative, analytical, technical, business, academic, journalism, marketing)

response_data.name: Multi-Agent Creative Writing Server
response_data.notice: Server is running in DEMO MODE. Configure OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable for full functionality.
workflow: 1. User submits topic OR outline, optional writing style, and optional protocol configurations via /api/start_writing
2a. If topic provided: Ideator generates outline and concepts using style-specific instructions
2b. If outline provided: Skip Ideator stage and proceed directly to Drafter
3. Drafter creates full draft from outline (generated or provided) in the specified style
4. Reviser improves draft quality according to style guidelines
5. Critic provides feedback based on style-specific criteria
6. All agent outputs are processed through configured protocols (e.g., punctuation control)

protocols.author: Daniel T. Sasser II

configuration_options.allowed_content_types: List of allowed MIME types for content retrieval
configuration_options.follow_redirects: Whether to follow HTTP redirects (default: true)
configuration_options.max_content_size: Maximum content size to download in bytes (default: 10MB)
configuration_options.max_redirects: Maximum number of redirects to follow (default: 5)
configuration_options.user_agent: User agent string for web requests
configuration_options.validate_ssl: Whether to validate SSL certificates (default: true)

protocols.description: AI agent hyperlink resolution and resource validation
protocols.name: Hyperlink Interpretation Protocol
process_flow: 1. Parse: Extract target path, domain, or reference from hyperlink
2. Determine Route: Select appropriate access method based on link type
3. Resolve: Attempt to access resource using selected route
4. Perform Task: Execute required task (validation, content retrieval)
5. Confirm & Log: Log action and return results
